about_the_game:
A trial version of Falsemen2:Upstream. If you really like it after playing the game, then support me.

FALSEMEN II: UPSTREAM, also known as NEW FALSEMEN II, is a complete reproduction of the RPG work Rescue the Great Demon 2 released in November 2016. The new generation has a new world outlook, a new story, a new character, a new style of art, a new sense of music... It took us three years to make everything new. Now let's bring you this new work, a Renaissance.

This is a RPG adventure game playing non-positive characters. In this story, the player will control a number of rebel leaders to fight against the powerful empire, save the trapped devil, overthrow human tyranny.

Choose your main role:

In this generation, there are seven main roles for compilation and manipulation. They have their own talents and skills and play a unique role in different situations.

Explore the vast world map:

The game allows players to explore six open world regions within a limited time, each with different cultures and treasures.

Against the hostile forces of the Empire:

You will be surrounded by hostile forces from the Empire! But don't be afraid to defeat them!

Experience the plot of the magnificent era:

This is a magnificent era! You and your teammates are witnesses of this era!

Except that——
Go deep into those secret places and answer those extra puzzles.
Remember, in the world of New Save the Lord 2, sometimes what you see is not true.
Glaciers and flames are often exterior to interior.

what can I experience in Falsemen2: Upstream? [/]

· Grand historical background and intertwined fantasy world view

· Exquisite expression of words, and the experience of reading by speaking

· Unique art style, classical and exquisite, and pay attention to the visual communication of atmosphere building

· Music that varies with the enemy and the scene, good enough to be heard in each capital for a single cycle

name: 拯救大魔王2:逆流 Falsemen2:Upstream Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIndows 7/8/10 x64
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • Storage: 540 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
